title: Building Work Day
description: Preparation for the slap being poured for the new gym today! Come help if you can lay plastic sheeting, install 4x8 insulation and tape. Call Mike or contact the office if you have questions!

title: 2024 Annual Shepherds’ Conference
description: The Rocky Mountain Bible Mission will be hosting the 2024 Annual Shepherds’ Conference from Tuesday, April 16 through Thursday, April 18 at Discovery Alliance Church in Missoula.

title: Parents Night Out
description: Drop your kids off and enjoy a "date" night while your children enjoy a supervised time of games and snack. For ages 2-12 years. You must RSVP to Julie by April 24th.

title: Celebration of Life
description: A Celebration of Life will be held for Jane Rectenwald at the Missoula Country Club

title: National Day of Prayer
description: You are invited to join us here at Lone Rock Bible Church for the National Day of Prayer.  The guest singer is Linda Lanier.  "Blessed is the nation whose God is THE LORD," Psalm 33:12

title: Ladies Luncheon
description: All Ladies are invited to a "Ladies Luncheon" at the Missoula Fairgrounds. All proceeds go to support local women in addiction recovery at Adult and Teen Challenge.

title: CareNet Fundraiser
description: The Spring Fundraising Gala, "Big Hearts Under the Big Sky" will be at the Downtown Holiday Inn.

title: Vacation Bible School
description: Kids K-6th grade are invited to join us for VBS. Contact us for more information!

title: Ladies Bible Study
description: The new study book is "First Corinthians, Living Love When We Disagree" by Melissa Spoelstra.   The cost of the book is $10.00.  To sign up contact Louisa Richardson.
